name: Mayday: A Mother's Day Emergency
description:
Oh no! The gift is still at the post office! Help cloud kid rush against time to pick up the package and save their family's Mother's Day plans! Controls : 

A, D - Left, Right 

Space - Jump 

LShift - Dash 

Credits :

turtttle: Programming, sfx and level design

thirteenz.zei: Art and sfx

Font:

Retro Gaming by Daymarius 

Songs:

All of the following by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

- Balloon Game 

- Jaunty Gumption 

- Bit Shift 

- Comic Hero 

- Digital Lemonade

This game was created for Make-A-Level (Mayday 2021) Jam
